result.title: Runtime Error on testcase#6 Problem 1B
result.content:
def numToAlpha(number):
    s = ''
    while number:
        residue = (number - 1) % 26
        s = chr(65 + int(residue)) + s
        number = (number - (residue + 1)) / 26
    return s

def alphaToNum(string):
    length = len(string)
    number = 0
    for i in range(len(string)):
        number = number + (ord(string[i])-64)*(26**(length-1))
        length = length - 1
    return number

#print(alphaToNum("BC"))
testcases = int(input())
while testcases:
    line = input()
    if (line[0]=='R') and (line[1].isdigit()):
        rowNum = line[1:line.find('C')]
        colNum = line[line.find('C')+1:len(line)]
        print(numToAlpha(int(colNum))+rowNum)
    else:
        count = 0
        while not(line[count].isdigit()):
            count = count + 1
        col = line[0:count]
        row = line[count:len(line)]
        string = 'R'+row+'C'+str(alphaToNum(col))
        print(string)
    testcases = testcases - 1

I'm getting runtime error don't know why it works fine on my machine.Please help :)
